title: ZygorGuides 4.0.7769
description:
Version: 4.0.7776Released on: January 9th, 2014

[H] Leveling
Arathi Highlands:
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs
Added extra tips
Rewrote a step that could result in a quest bugging
Fixed a waypoint that wasn't working

Badlands:
Added extra tips
Fixed a waypoint for quest
Moved a quest waypoint to a better spawn point

Burning Steppes:
Added extra tips
Rewrote step that wasn't completing
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs

Cape of Stranglethorn:
Added extra tips
Linked a purchased item to guide, to give the auto-purchase option
Moved a step to speed up the next step
Made minor changes throughout to improve guide consistency

[A] Tailoring
Amount of Netherweave Cloth required increased.

[B] Localization
Resolved an issue causing "Bog Crocolisks" to be displayed as (NPC 54558)
